Title: UCO StormProof SweetFire Tinder - 20 pk
Body (HTML):
This is a STORMPROOF version of the popular award winning Sweetfire Strikeable Fire Starter. Stormproof means that it will relight after being submerged in water. The advantage of the sweetfire over a normal waterproof or stormproof match is that it includes tinder in the 'point'. Light the 'point' just like a match and it will burn for 7 mins to help you start a fire like a boss. Go prepared! 

This new Stormproof Sweetfire is not only sweet for your gear collection, it's sweet for the planet. Made from a sugarcane by-product called bagasse, this key ingredient is already used around the world as a renewable biofuel. Each of these match points (there are 20 per box) is infused with vegetable wax to allow for up to 7 minutes of burn time per each point. There's also no need to bring matches to light the Sweetfire as each match point has a strikeable tip that can conveniently be used with the striker on the box.

FEATURES

  • Made from sugarcane waste — Bagasse is a fibrous sugarcane by-product and is used around the world as a renewable biofuel.
  • 20 individual ‘Points’ conveniently connected & ready to break-off and use.
  • Each Point burns for 7 minutes each.
  • Strikable tip, can be used with striker on box, eliminating need for matches.
  • Infused with vegetable wax, UCO Sweetfire is good for the planet & great for every adventure.


PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

  • Package Dimensions: 5.5" x .75" x .4"
  • Packaged Weight: 4.9 oz. (82 g)

Title: Stance Sunshine Stripe No Show Socks
Body (HTML):
Put a little pep in your step with these sunshine-y socks that are begging for blue skies. They're made with a no-show cut, anti-heel slip grip and a lightweight combed cotton blend for low-key comfort. Add in our guaranteed Infiknit™ construction and you've got one pair of really happy feet. Oh, sunny day!

Infiknit™ Lifetime Guarantee

  • Our Infiknit™ technology never rips, never tears. Made for good. But if you’re turbo-gnarly and rip one, we got you.

Light Cushioning

  • These lightweight socks offer a breathable barrier between your foot and shoe with select cushioning.
Cotton Blend
  • 46% nylon, 28% combed cotton, 23% elastane, 3% elastic

Title: Stance Windy Peak Hike Crew Socks
Body (HTML):
Fully Supported... Mid cushion socks target critical areas to create a medium weight barrier between your foot and shoe. Ideal for a range of low to high impact activities, built to withstand each and every stride thanks to Infiknit™ technology for guaranteed durability.

Infiknit™ Lifetime Guarantee

  • Our Infiknit™ technology never rips, never tears. Made for good. But if you’re turbo-gnarly and rip one, we got you.

Crew

  • A classic sock height that hits the mid-point of your lower leg.

Medium Cushioning

  • Moderate cushioning throughout the sock for a secure fit with enhanced impact protection.
Merino Wool Blend
  • 38% nylon, 33% merino wool, 26% polyester, 3% elastane

Performance Cushioning

  • Performance Cushioning combines impact protection with comfort to keep you pushing.

Channeled Air Cushioning

  • Breathe easy with the enhanced airflow of our Channeled Air Cushioning.

Boot Protection

  • Boot Protection complements your climb with strategically-placed cushioning.

Performance Arch Support

  • Performance Arch Support fights off strain and fatigue to keep you moving.

Seamless Toe Closure

  • Seamless Toe Closure for an anti-friction finish your feet will love.

Performance Mesh

  • Performance Mesh keeps you cool with maximized airflow and breathability.

Title: Stance Palette Quarter Socks
Body (HTML):
Colorful line-up. Live out loud by decking out your feet in a striped palette of bold color. We've crafted these versatile quarter cut socks with Infiknit™ technology that resists rips and tears, for you to enjoy for a lifetime. Pure artistry.

Infiknit™ Lifetime Guarantee

  • Our Infiknit™ technology never rips, never tears. Made for good. But if you’re turbo-gnarly and rip one, we got you.

Quarter

  • Landing at just above your ankle, these socks are the mid-point between our no show and crew heights.

Medium Cushioning

  • Moderate cushioning throughout the sock for a secure fit with enhanced impact protection.
Cotton Blend
  • 67% combed cotton, 20% polyester, 11% nylone, 2% elastane

Title: Hydro Flask Kid's Small Insulated Lunch Box
Body (HTML):
Lunch time made easy.

Hydro Flask's Kids Insulated Lunch Box features a fun, kid-friendly design and a durable build fit for the playground. A fully lined interior makes for easy clean up, and flexible handle makes this lunch box easy for little hands to carry. Maximum insulation keeps their favorite foods cold for hours.

Maximum Insulation

Two layers of insulation means lunch stays cold for hours.

Comfortable Carry

Just the right size for little hands, our flexible handle makes for easy carry – wherever lunchtime may be.

Product Benefits

  • Two layers of insulation means your favorite foods stay cold for hours
  • Kid-friendly design and a durable build fit for the playground
  • For ages 5+
  • A fully lined interior means simple wipe down and easy clean up
  • Flexible handle is easy for little hands to carry
  • Interior band holds utensils and an ice pack and wipes clean
  • FDA food grade, BPA-free liner. Free from toxins, free from worry.

  • Easy to Clean: A fully lined interior means simple wipe down and easy clean up.

     

    Size & Dimensions

    3.5 L
    Volume 3.5 L
    Weight 1.5 lb
    Dimensions 10.6" H x 4.40" W x 9.57" L

Title: Stance Icon No Show Socks
Body (HTML):
Designed for just enough coverage without detection, every pair of Stance No Shows come correct with our No Slip Grip to prevent any unwanted slippage. These superior invisibles boast Deep Heel Pockets combined with targeted cushioning for all-day comfort you can really sink your feet into. Behold innovation on the low with a no show like no other.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

  • We stand behind our product and want to make sure that you’re happy. Not stoked? We’ll make it right.

Light Cushioning

  • These lightweight socks offer a breathable barrier between your foot and shoe with select cushioning.
Cotton Blend
  • 55% combed cotton, 41% nylon, 4% elastane

Seamless Toe Closure

  • Seamless Toe Closure for an anti-friction finish your feet will love.

Deep Heel Pocket

  • Deep Heel Pockets complement your arch with that feel-good fit.

These superior invisibles boast Deep Heel Pockets combined with targeted cushioning for all-day comfort you can really sink your feet into. Behold innovation on the low with a no show like no other.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

  • We stand behind our product and want to make sure that you’re happy. Not stoked? We’ll make it right.

Light Cushioning

  • These lightweight socks offer a breathable barrier between your foot and shoe with select cushioning.
Cotton Blend
  • 55% combed cotton, 41% nylon, 4% elastane

Seamless Toe Closure

  • Seamless Toe Closure for an anti-friction finish your feet will love.

Deep Heel Pocket

  • Deep Heel Pockets complement your arch with that feel-good fit.

Title: Stance Joven Crew Socks
Body (HTML):
Our Uncommon Solids are the staple to every sock drawer. Available in multiple color ways, the Joven sports sophisticated features and are more versatile than a Swiss army knife. Its luxurious combed cotton and deep heel pocket cradle your feet in comfort while its reinforced heel and toe provide additional durability. To help your feet breathe, the sock sports mesh vents.

100% Satisfaction Guarantee

  • We stand behind our product and want to make sure that you’re happy. Not stoked? We’ll make it right.

Crew

  • A classic sock height that hits the mid-point of your lower leg.

Medium Cushioning

  • Moderate cushioning throughout the sock for a secure fit with enhanced impact protection.
Cotton Blend
  • 83% combed cotton, 8% polyester, 7% nylon, 2% elastane

Targeted Cushioning

  • Targeted Cushioning for added comfort where you need it most.

Engineered Arch Support

  • Engineered Arch Support stabilizes your swing in style.

Seamless Toe Closure

  • Seamless Toe Closure for an anti-friction finish your feet will love.

Title: SmartWool Merino 250 Glove
Body (HTML):
These touchscreen compatible Merino 250 Gloves are breathable, warm, and odor-resistant. And our 100% Merino wool is incredibly soft. Like. Unbelievably soft.

Benefits

Merino 250

This heavier, soft, 100% Merino wool fabric offers breathable warmth, moves sweat away from the body, and provides next-to-skin comfort in colder conditions

Features

  • 100% Merino wool fabric made with interlocking knit for enhanced comfort, breathability, thermoregulation, and odor resistance
  • Touchscreen-compatible thumb and index finger
  • Knit in Vietnam: 100% Merino Wool
  • Garment Weight: 40 g = 1.41 oz
  • Style: SW019001

Care

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors

Mammut Ducan High GTX Women Hiking Boot
Body (HTML):
Conquer the mountains with the lightweight Ducan Mid GTX® Women hiking shoe for day tours or demanding trails. The shoe is distinguished by its novel combination of cutting-edge technologies. Mammut’s Flextron Technology uses a spring-steel sole to prevent deflection of the foot and provide precise support in the shoe, while the Mammut Georganic 3D Technology improves the fit for greater flexibility and comfort by naturally tailoring the cut of the shoe to the foot. You can rely implicitly on the Ducan Mid GTX® Women.

 

  • Flex index

    A6

  • Lace system

    Asymetric

  • Soles

    Vibram® Flextron

  • Material

    Double Layer Engineered Mesh

  • Lining

    GORE-TEX Extended Comfort Footwear

  • Cut

    Basic

  • Base Fit®: Sliding webbing transfers power from lacing area to soles, ensuring improved hold in boot to increase safety and comfort.
  • Elastic GORE-TEX® tongue construction
  • Mammut Flextron Technology™
  • Engineered Mesh
  • Mammut Georganic 3D Technology
  • Vibram® Flextron Outsole

  • Mammut flextron technology
    Gore-tex®

    Elastic GORE-TEX Tongue Construction

    Vibram

    The Vibram sole offers great grip for surefooted navigation – even on the roughest terrain.

     

    Fair Wear

    Mammut strives to ensure fair and safe working conditions in all factories making its products. To systematically improve working conditions throughout its supply chain, Mammut was the first outdoor brand to join the Fair Wear Foundation.

    •

You can rely implicitly on the Ducan Mid GTX® Women.

Title: Mammut Ducan High GTX Men Hiking Boot
Body (HTML):
A super-sporty and agile hiking shoe for multi-day outings, trekking excursions or fast-paced hikes in the mountains, incorporating the benefits of cutting-edge production techniques. The core of the Ducan High GTX® Men is the Mammut Flextron technology which integrates a spring-steel sole as a midsole in the shoe. This prevents deflection of the foot while at the same time providing improved vertical support. The result: more efficient use of energy on hikes and climbs. Mammut Georganic 3D technology ensures natural movement of the foot. The geometric-dynamic design is combined with cuts tailored organically to the foot. The focal point is the anatomical last which, together with the asymmetric lacing and mono-tongue for one-sided entry, provides a very good fit. With the specially designed vibram® sole, the Ducan High GTX® Men will bring you outstanding grip on uneven terrain in the world of nature and the mountains.

Title: Mammut Mercury Tour II High GTX Men Hiking Boot
Body (HTML):
Welcome to the Mercury family: the Mercury Tour II High GTX Men will accompany you in technical terrain, bringing improved support and greater grip with a redesigned vibram sole. For an optimum sure-footed step on day outings or multi-day hikes carrying a heavy load. On the outside, the shoe impresses with the sustainable terracare leather, tanned in an environmentally friendly process, which gives it an enhanced fit and treats your foot to pampering comfort on every path. High-quality GORE TEX material gives the shoe waterproof properties. Making the Mercury Tour II High GTX Men an ideal companion in the mountains.

  • Last index: hiking

  • Lace system: 2 Zone
  • terracare leather - made in Germany
  • Elastic GORE-TEX tongue construction
  • 2 Zone Lacing: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
  • 3D memo foam
  • Liquid Rubber Protection: Zones featuring Liquid Rubber reinforcements protect against abrasion and damage.
  • Board lasting
  • Vibram 4 Trek technology

Title: Mammut Mercury Tour II High GTX Men Hiking Boot
Body (HTML):
Welcome to the Mercury family: the Mercury Tour II High GTX Men will accompany you in technical terrain, bringing improved support and greater grip with a redesigned vibram sole. For an optimum sure-footed step on day outings or multi-day hikes carrying a heavy load. On the outside, the shoe impresses with the sustainable terracare leather, tanned in an environmentally friendly process, which gives it an enhanced fit and treats your foot to pampering comfort on every path. High-quality GORE TEX material gives the shoe waterproof properties. Making the Mercury Tour II High GTX Men an ideal companion in the mountains.

  • Last index: hiking
  • Flex index: A7
  • Lace system: 2 Zone
  • terracare leather - made in Germany
  • Elastic GORE-TEX tongue construction
  • 2 Zone Lacing: Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
  • 3D memo foam
  • Liquid Rubber Protection: Zones featuring Liquid Rubber reinforcements protect against abrasion and damage.
  • Board lasting
  • Vibram 4 Trek technology

SmartWool Merino 150 Baselayer Long Sleeve - Women's
Body (HTML):
An all-season favorite, the Merino 150 Long Sleeve can be sported as a base layer in the fall or summer when it's time to go backpacking. This base layer features Core Spun technology—which features Merino wrapped around a nylon core for added durability while still keeping the comfort of ultra-soft, responsibly sourced Merino next to skin. Our Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for perfect comfort under a pack, and smooth merrow stitching wraps from side to front to keep you looking as good as you feel.

Benefits

Body Mapped Mesh Venting for Women

Gender-specific mesh in key areas to increase breathability and comfort

Features

  • Slim Fit
  • Our lightest weight Merino jersey fabric uses a nylon core to increase durability while still keeping 100% Merino wool next to skin
  • Raglan sleeve design eliminates need for shoulder seams
  • Side seams wrap onto front for enhanced fit
  • Stretch merrow stitching designed to elevate comfort, range of motion, and fit
  • Dusk Marble Wash, Cloudy Blue Marble Wash, Indigo Blue, and Tea Rose colorways feature plant-based-dye technique
  • Knit in Vietnam: 87% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon Core
  • Style: SW015255

Care

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors

Our Raglan sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for perfect comfort under a pack, and smooth merrow stitching wraps from side to front to keep you looking as good as you feel.

Benefits

Body Mapped Mesh Venting for Women

Gender-specific mesh in key areas to increase breathability and comfort

Features

  • Slim Fit
  • Our lightest weight Merino jersey fabric uses a nylon core to increase durability while still keeping 100% Merino wool next to skin
  • Raglan sleeve design eliminates need for shoulder seams
  • Side seams wrap onto front for enhanced fit
  • Stretch merrow stitching designed to elevate comfort, range of motion, and fit
  • Dusk Marble Wash, Cloudy Blue Marble Wash, Indigo Blue, and Tea Rose colorways feature plant-based-dye technique
  • Knit in Vietnam: 87% Merino Wool, 13% Nylon Core
  • Style: SW015255

Care

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors

Title: SmartWool Smartloft 60 Hoodie Vest - Women's
Body (HTML):
Designed for warmth, packability, and comfort, the Women's Smartloft 60 Hoody Vest uses a nylon shell with DWR weather protection to shield you from the elements and 50% recycled Merino insulation to keep out the cold. This women's hoodie won't let the weather keep you inside any longer.

Benefits

DWR finish

DWR finish (Durable Water Repellent) helps repel water from fabric surface

Merino 250

This heavier, soft, 100% Merino wool fabric offers breathable warmth, moves sweat away from the body, and provides next-to-skin comfort in colder conditions

Recycled Wool 50%

This product is made with repurposed, reclaimed recycled wool content as part of its construction. The percentage varies by garment.

SmartLoft 60

Our lightest weight of 50% recycled insulation is designed for high-intensity activities in more mild winter conditions. Helps provide thermoregulation and warmth even when wet.

Wind Protection

Wind-resistant panels protect against the elements

Features

  • Regular Fit
  • 60g proprietary 50% recycled wool insulation offers lightweight, packable warmth, breathability, and insulation even when wet
  • Wind-resistant nylon with DWR protects from the elements
  • Insulation is lined with Merino for comfort, sweat management, and odor control
  • Merino 250 fabric panels provide ease of movement and breathability
  • Two zip hand pockets, internal zip chest pocket with cord routing
  • Knit in Vietnam: Shell - 100% Nylon; Side Panel - 100% Merino Wool; Lining: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Polyester; Filling - 50% Recycled Wool/Reclaimed Wool, 38% Wool, 12% Polyester
  • Garment Weight: 309 g | 10.9 oz
  • Style: SW014072

Care

  • Machine Wash Cold Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors

Body (HTML):
Want a Smartwool® base layer that looks good, but plays better? Our Merino 150 Short Sleeve shirt works well for any adventure. This base layer features Core Spun technology—which features Merino wrapped around a nylon core for added durability while still keeping the comfort of ultra-soft, responsibly sourced Merino next to skin. With smooth merrow stitching and raglan sleeves, you can stay comfortable in your clothes and confident in your look.

Benefits

Core Spun

Merino fibers wrapped around a nylon core for added durability while still keeping the comfort of Merino next to skin

Merino 150

This breathable, soft, lightweight fabric offers next-to-skin comfort, moves sweat away from the body, and acts as a versatile performance layer for warmer conditions.

UPF 20+

Naturally protects against the sun's rays

Features

  • Slim Fit
  • Our lightest weight Merino jersey fabric uses a nylon core to increase durability while still keeping 100% Merino wool next to skin
  • Raglan sleeve design eliminates need for shoulder seams
  • Side seams wrap onto front for enhanced fit
  • Stretch merrow stitching designed to elevate comfort, range of motion, and fit
  • UPF 20+

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.

Title: SmartWool Merino 250 Baselayer 1/4 Zip - Women's
Body (HTML):
We've updated the fit of our Women's Merino 250 Base Layer 1/4 Zip to improve functionality while also enhancing aesthetics. As one of our heaviest base layer tops and one of our best base layers for cold weather, this garment uses 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool, shoulder panels, and a flatlock seam construction to help minimize chafing as well as keep you comfortable and temperature regulated as you enjoy high-intensity skiing, hiking, running, and more.

Benefits

Merino 250

This heavier, soft, 100% Merino wool fabric offers breathable warmth, moves sweat away from the body, and provides next-to-skin comfort in colder conditions

Features

  • Slim Fit
  • 100% Merino wool fabric made with an interlock knit for enhanced comfort, breathability, thermoregulation, and odor resistance
  • Fit updated to improve functionality while enhancing aesthetics for a range of body shapes
  • Back body seam wraps to front for body-enhancing fit
  • Crew neck with raglan sleeves
  • Flatlock seam construction designed to minimize chafing
  • 8" (20 cm) center front zip with semi-locking slider
  • Knit in China: 100% Merino Wool
  • Garment Weight: 236 g = 8.32 oz
  • Style: SW016373

Care

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors
Option1 Value: Medium Gray Heather,Black,Alpine Blue Heather,Very Berry Heather,Canyon Rose Heather,Charcoal Heather,Desert Orchid Heather,Woodsmoke Heather

As one of our heaviest base layer tops and one of our best base layers for cold weather, this garment uses 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool, shoulder panels, and a flatlock seam construction to help minimize chafing as well as keep you comfortable and temperature regulated as you enjoy high-intensity skiing, hiking, running, and more.

Benefits

Merino 250

This heavier, soft, 100% Merino wool fabric offers breathable warmth, moves sweat away from the body, and provides next-to-skin comfort in colder conditions

Features

  • Slim Fit
  • 100% Merino wool fabric made with an interlock knit for enhanced comfort, breathability, thermoregulation, and odor resistance
  • Fit updated to improve functionality while enhancing aesthetics for a range of body shapes
  • Back body seam wraps to front for body-enhancing fit
  • Crew neck with raglan sleeves
  • Flatlock seam construction designed to minimize chafing
  • 8" (20 cm) center front zip with semi-locking slider
  • Knit in China: 100% Merino Wool
  • Garment Weight: 236 g = 8.32 oz
  • Style: SW016373

Care

  • Machine Wash Warm Gentle Cycle.
  • Do Not Iron Decorations.
  • Do Not Bleach
  • Tumble Dry Low
  • Cool Iron As Needed
  • Do Not Dry Clean
  • Wash With Like Colors

Title: Therm-A-Rest Valve Repair Kit
Body (HTML):
If you find your valve not functioning properly, dont sweat it. Our WingLock Valve Repair Kit allows you to easily replace your WingLock valve and continue enjoying the lightning-fast inflation and deflation of your pad.

Features/Specifications:

Replacement WingLock valve

Tube of lubricant

Title: Therm-A-Rest Classic Valve Repair Kit
Body (HTML):
Did your dog chew the valve off your brand-new Therm-a-Rest® pad? Our Classic Valve Repair Kit makes replacement quick and easy. It includes adhesive and a replacement valve that installs in a few minutes.

Includes

  • Replacement Classic Valve
  • Tube of lubricant
  • Instructions

Title: Therm-A-Rest Universal Couple Kit
Body (HTML): Therm-A-Rest's Universal Couple Kit securely holds any two Therm-a-Rest mattresses side-by-side (20"-30" wide), making it perfect for couples who want to sleep close together but don’t want to get stuck in the gap between their mattresses in the middle of the night.

Title: Therm-A-Rest Permanent Home Repair Kit
Body (HTML):
The Permanent Home Repair Kit uses a wet adhesive and fabric patches to make the strongest and most durable Therm-a-Rest® mattress repairs possible. It is also the best choice for repairing larger tears. Works on all Therm-a-Rest mattresses, including NeoAir. *Requires a 4-hour cure time.

*colors of patches may vary from picture.

Light & Motion Vis 500 Commuter Combo Bike Light
Body (HTML):
An ideal front and rear combo kit for the daily rider that values performance, reliability, and convenience. The Vis is a classic style headlight, with a button that gives the user 4 different modes to choose from. The smart Vya taillight features auto on/off technology with no buttons - just start riding and it automatically activates the SafePulse beam. High visibility is paramount and dedicated amber sidelights front and rear are distinct and easily recognizable by drivers, especially through intersections. Reliable construction is unmatched in the market and exceeds the needs of daily riders as both lights are certified to withstand 1 meter drops on concrete and are fully waterproof to ensure longterm reliability. Recharging is fast and efficient through Micro USB (Vis) or through direct USB (Vya). Blending the best-selling Vis 500 headlight with the state-of-the-art Vya, daily riders now have the perfect setup to stay safe and visible.

  • 500 Lumen Headlight and 50 Lumen Taillight certified to the FL-1 Standard with premium CREE LEDs
  • Visibility is enhanced with amber side lighting front and rear providing maximum safety through intersections and high-traffic areas
  • Pulsing beam patterns provide effective visibility day and night
  • Vya Taillight features smart auto-on/auto-off technology for commuter convenience
  • Secure mounting with durable straps prevents lights from moving when riding on uneven/bumpy terrain
  • Quick release allows removal in seconds while leaving the base mount on the bike
  • Waterproof design eliminates the leading cause of bike light failure - water immersion
  • Charging is reliable and efficient through with included Micro USB cable (Vis) and through direct USB blade (Vya)
  • Lumins Output: High (500), Medium (250), Low (125), Pulse (125)
  • Charge time: 270 Min
  • Beam Angle: 20° (spot)
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 67
  • Depth Rating (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Impact Resistance (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Thermal Management: Passive Cooling
  • Fast Charge: False
  • Product Dimensions: 1.2" x 1.2" x 4"

Title: Light & Motion VIS 1000 Power Combo Cycling Light
Body (HTML):
The Vis 1000 Power Combo provides extreme power for superior night and day safety. Easy USB recharge, quick mounting, and industry-leading performance and reliability.

  • Huge output with 1000 lumen headlight and 150 lumen taillight.
  • Both lights have powerful side lighting for maximum safety through intersections and high traffic areas.
  • High-output SafePulse mode is ideal for daytime safety and is proven to enhance driver’s depth perception when approaching rider.
  • Multiple power options (1.5 – 12 hrs. headlight, 6 – 12 hrs. taillight) conserve runtime to ensure lights can be used on extended rides.
  • Quick and easy mounting, quick switch between bikes, and easy charging via micro USB cable.
  • Industry-leading durability and reliability, and a 2-year warranty.

Vis 1000

  • Lumen Output (Vis 1000): 1000 (high), 500 (medium), 250 (low), 500 (SafePulse)
  • Runtime (minutes) (Vis 1000): 90 (high), 180 (medium), 360 (low), 720 (SafePulse)
  • Beam Angle: 20° (Spot)
  • Charge Time: 270 min
  • Fast Charge: No
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 67
  • Depth Rating (FL-1): 1 meter(s)
  • Impact Resistance (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Product Weight: 155 grams
  • Product Dimensions: 1.2" x 1.2" x 4"
  • Compatible Mounts: Bar, GoPro, Helmet

Vis 180 Pro

  • Lumen Output: High Steady (150), High SafePulse (150), Low SafePulse (125)
  • Runtime (minutes): 240 (steady), 360(high safepulse), 720 (low safepulse), 1920 (Paceline)
  • Charge time: 300 Min
  • Beam Angle: 180° (flood)
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 65
  • Thermal Management: Passive Cooling
  • Fast Charge: False
  • Product Dimensions: 3" x 1" x .9"

Title: Light & Motion Vya Smart Taillight
Body (HTML):
The future of cycling taillights is here. Vya is a game-changing design, blending powerful output with revolutionary smart features. The piercing 50 lumen output is easily visible over a distance of 1km, even in bright daylight. What separates Vya from traditional taillights are smart auto-on/off sensors - start riding and the light turns on automatically and will shut itself off after the ride, with a delay built in for stoplights. The scientifically designed SafePulse beam pattern not only gets noticed from motorists, but allows the driver to accurately judge distance from the rider and their direction of travel - a safety feature not possible with strobing lights. Attaching Vya is effortless with a simple clockwise 1/4 turn into the mount locking the light in place and activating the auto-on feature. When it comes time to recharge, remove Vya from the mount in seconds and insert the integrated USB paddle directly into a computer or USB power outlet - no cables keeps recharging simple and convenient. The next evolution in bike safety, Vya takes powerful safety lighting and keeps the rider safe so they can focus on the road ahead.
  • 50 Lumen Output certified to the FL-1 Standard with high powered premium CREE LED
  • Smart sensor technology senses motion and automatically turns Vya on when inserted into mount and will remain on, even when a rider pauses at stoplights
  • Auto-off when bike is parked or light is removed from mount to prevent the dreaded 'dead bike light' when it comes time for the next ride
  • SafePulse beam pattern scientifically designed to enhance a passing driver's ability to judge the cyclist's distance and direction of travel without the risks associated with flashing lights
  • Beam pattern optimized to give a wide red swath of light that can be seen clearly from the rear and side ideal for city riding
  • An impressive 8 hour runtime allows Vya to be used on multiple rides before needing a recharge, low battery status is indicated by rapidly flashing sidelights
  • Ultra-compact mount with durable rubber strap designed to be compatible with various size seat posts and can even be attached to seat stays
  • USB Mount Receptor allows light to be securely mounted or removed from bike in seconds with a simple, secure 1/4 turn lock; light will not turn on when removed from mount
  • Direct USB charging without cables fully charges in 2 hours
  • Made with bio-renewable material waterproof to 1 meter (when inserted in mount) for all-conditions reliability (IP67 Rated)
  • Lumen Output: Safepulse (50)
  • Charge time: 120 Min
  • Beam Angle: 30° (flood)
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 67
  • Depth Rating (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Impact Resistance (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Thermal Management: Passive Cooling
  • Fast Charge: False
  • Product Dimensions: 2.6" x 1.3" x 0.8"

Title: Light & Motion VIS 500 Onyx Cyling Light
Body (HTML):
The perfect bike headlight for city riders that want premium features with an entry level price. High visibility is prioritized and the platform has dedicated amber sidelights that are distinct and easily recognizable by drivers, especially through intersections. City riders will appreciate the exclusive SafePulse beam, scientifically designed to provide the highest level of rider awareness without the risks associated with flashing lights. Easily mount on standard or oversize handlebars with a mount that provides enhanced grip and features quick release technology to remove in seconds. Reliable construction is unmatched in the market and exceeds the needs of daily riders. This is the only waterproof lighting platform with a certified IP67 rating - meaning the light is certified to withstand water immersion up to a depth of 1 meter. Commute with the added assurance knowing rain or shine the light will keep performing. Recharging is fast and efficient with the included Micro USB cable. All the innovative safety features of the premium Vis Lights with a value based price, Vis 500 is the leader in its class.
  • 500 Lumen Output certified to the FL-1 Standard with high powered premium CREE LED
  • Visibility is enhanced with bright amber side lighting providing maximum safety through intersections and high-traffic areas
  • Daylight visible pulse mode keeps cyclist safe without the inherent dangers of flashing lights
  • Micro-peened reflector optimizes the beam pattern for road riders providing a smooth, even spot beam void of distracting hard edges
  • Multiple power settings to achieve long runtimes for extended rides
  • Multi-color battery indicator is driven by custom firmware to provide accurate battery status throughout entire runtime
  • Mounting is simple and effective with ultra-grippy rubber ensuring light doesn't slip on regular or oversize handlebars
  • Quick release allows the removal of the light in seconds while leaving the base mount on the handlebar
  • Waterproof design eliminates the leading cause of bike light failure - water immersion
  • Charging is reliable and simple with included Micro USB cable
  • Lumens: 500 (high), 250 (medium), 125 (low), 125 (Safe Pulse)
  • Runtime (minutes): 90 (high), 180 (medium), 360 (low), 720 (pulse)
  • Beam Angle: 20° (Spot)
  • Charge Time: 270 min
  • Fast Charge: No
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 67
  • Depth Rating (FL-1): 1 meter(s)
  • Impact Resistance (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Product Weight: 121 grams
  • Product Dimensions: 1.2" x 1.2" x 4"
  • Compatible Mounts: Bar, GoPro, Helmet

Daily commuting requires equipment that provides superior performance, in any condition, day after day. Vis 1000 blends impressive power with a safety feature set unmatched in cycling lights. High visibility is paramount and the platform has dedicated amber sidelights that are distinct and easily recognizable by drivers, especially through intersections. Integrating state-of-the-art safety innovations with premium power, Vis 1000 is designed for the serious cyclist.

  • 1000 Lumen Output certified to the FL-1 Standard with high powered premium CREE LED

Title: Light & Motion VIS 360 Pro Helmet Mount Light
Body (HTML):
A featherweight helmet light perfect for cyclists that demand the safety and protection of visibility from all angles. The Vis 360 Pro was designed in response to extensive research on commuter safety and has quickly won the heart of cyclists around the globe concerned about their visibility on roadways. For serious riders that recognize the importance of making themselves highly visible to other vehicles, the Vis 360 Pro is truly an innovative solution that you won't want to ride without. Easy snap mount and micro-USB charging allow the Vis to seamlessly integrate into your cycling experience.
  • 600 Lumen Headlight and 25 Lumen Taillight certified to the FL-1 Standard with premium CREE LEDs for optimum visibility day and night
  • Dedicated amber side lighting provides maximum safety through intersections and high-traffic areas resulting in 360 degrees of protective illumination
  • Optimized for everyday commuting, rear light can also be turned off transforming the system into a featherweight mountain bike helmet light
  • Micro-peened reflector on headlight optimizes the beam pattern providing a smooth spot void of distracting hard edges, rear light is concentrated to create a punchy pulsing red beam
  • Multiple power settings conserve runtime for adventure rides including a 70 lumen/12 hour option for the longest of tours
  • Lightweight universal helmet mounting with a secure clip-on design
  • Waterproof construction eliminates the leading cause of bike light failure - water immersion
  • Rear light also contains the unit's high capacity lithium-ion battery that is recharged through Micro USB
  • Optional Adventure Head Strap transforms Vis 360 Pro into a high performance headlamp
  • Lumins Output: High (600), Medium (300), Low (150), Pulse (150), Camp (70)
  • Charge time: 360 Min
  • Beam Angle: 20° (spot)
  • IP Rating (FL-1): 67
  • Depth Rating (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Impact Resistance (FL-1): 1 meter
  • Thermal Management: Passive Cooling
  • Fast Charge: False
  • Product Dimensions: 1" x 1" 1.25"

Title: Fox River Thermal Heavyweight Mid-Calf Boot Socks
Body (HTML):
Great for a variety of outdoor excursions, these FoxSox keep you warm and dry. Whether you're in cool fall temperatures or the mid-winter freeze, these heavyweight socks will cut out the cold.

  • Fully thermalined construction insulates to block out cold
  • Cushion throughout absorbs shocks and impacts from boot
  • Contour rib top holds sock in place to eliminate slippage
  • Smooth, flat comfort toe seam
  • 55% acrylic, 35% wool, 8% stretch nylon, 2% spandex

Title: Fox River Wick Dry Maximum Medium Weight Mid-Calf Boot Socks
Body (HTML):
These FoxSox take all the duty you can dish out. Extra cushioning softens the blows your feet take every day. Quick-dry fibers make washing a simple task. Superb fit minimizes bunching and blistering. Our exclusive Wick Dry™ technology keeps feet dry while our URfit® System provides support. Scentrytechnology resists odor in the sock.

    • URfit® System provides arch support and memory-knit construction
    • Fully cushioned sole and leg absorb shocks and insulate
    • Multifilament yarn construction makes it very abrasion resistant and adds durability
    • Smooth, flat comfort toe seam

Body (HTML):

  • URfit® System provides arch support and memory-knit construction
  • Full cushion throughout absorbs shocks and insulates
  • Reinforced toe and heel add durability and longer sock life
  • Smooth, flat comfort toe seam
  • 37% Merino wool, 24% nylon, 20% TENCEL, 17% acrylic, 2% spandex
